channel.title: KnR Show
channel.description: It's just Kendall and Ryan and all our friends going on and on about this and that. Check out more than you ever wanted to know at http://myspace.com/knrshow. Download. Listen. Enjoy.
channel.itunes:subtitle: myspace.com/knrshow
channel.itunes:author: Kendall and Ryan
channel.itunes:summary: It's just Kendall and Ryan and all our friends going on and on about this and that. Check out more than you ever wanted to know at http://myspace.com/knrshow. Download. Listen. Enjoy.

item.title: KnR Show 21
item.description: Uh-oh. This one may make some of you think. Sorry about that. But don't worry. There is still plenty of funny.
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: Uh-oh. This one may make some of you think. Sorry about that. But don't worry. There is still plenty of funny.

item.title: KnR Show 20
item.description: It's good. Real good. Tell everyone to listen. NOW!
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: It's good. Real good. Tell everyone to listen. NOW!

item.title: Knr Show 19
item.description: We're Back! Fear not. Your fix is in. Discover your new addiction. If you've somehow stopped jonesing, get hooked all over again.
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: We're Back! Fear not. Your fix is in. Discover your new addiction. If you've somehow stopped jonesing, get hooked all over again.

item.title: KnR Show 18
item.description: This is our best show to date. That is not opinion, it's FACT. The best line yet is offered up by Ryan. The most uncomfortable segment ever keeps Kendall in stutter mode. That and so much more make this a must listen episode.
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: This is our best show to date. That is not opinion, it's FACT. The best line yet is offered up by Ryan. The most uncomfortable segment ever keeps Kendall in stutter mode. That and so much more make this a must listen episode.

item.title: KnR Show #17
item.description: What do you do when a guest won't leave? Celebrate! Tommy Drake hung out for the whole show and we had a blast. Kendall also tried to interview his daughter about Sara and the Starfish. He probably won't do that again... Enjoy. And tell all your friends.
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: What do you do when a guest won't leave? Celebrate! Tommy Drake hung out for the whole show and we had a blast. Kendall also tried to interview his daughter about Sara and the Starfish. He probably won't do that again... Enjoy. And tell all your friends.

item.title: KnR Show #16
item.description: Stephanie's maid/dealer. Ryan's review of International Festival. Breaking News...Gas prices are high. Stephanie's KnR Show application. The first ever game of "Is or Isn't."
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: Stephanie's maid/dealer. Ryan's review of International Festival. Breaking News...Gas prices are high. Stephanie's KnR Show application. The first ever game of "Is or Isn't."

item.title: KnR Show 15
item.description: Is the show Bi now? The alien baby arrives. Kendall travels America and gets a "regular" massage. Ryan has lots to share.
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: Is the show Bi now? The alien baby arrives. Kendall travels America and gets a "regular" massage. Ryan has lots to share.

item.title: KnR Show 14
item.description: Fighting the Man. Stephanie Performs Tyra Monologe at Audition. Nornna Mania. New Intro Introduced. And the Show Gets Downright Dirty.
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: Fighting the Man. Stephanie Performs Tyra Monologe at Audition. Nornna Mania. New Intro Introduced. And the Show Gets Downright Dirty.

item.title: KnR Show 13
item.description: KnR's Baker's Dozenth Show. Answering these and so many other questions. What is the Fudge Story? This guy is a hard hitting journalist? Where can Katie Holmes go to escape Scientology? What should you not do to your friends at 8 am the day after St. Patrick's Day?
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: KnR's Baker's Dozenth Show. Answering these and so many other questions. What is the Fudge Story? This guy is a hard hitting journalist? Where can Katie Holmes go to escape Scientology? What should you not do to your friends at 8 am the day after St. Patrick's Day?

item.title: KnR Show 12
item.description: We're BACK. Sorry for the wait. David Sadof spend the hour with us in studio. It's like all the regular KnR happy fun times with D, too. David is the biggest music geek in Houston and possibly Texas and beyond.
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: We're BACK. Sorry for the wait. David Sadof spend the hour with us in studio. It's like all the regular KnR happy fun times with D, too. David is the biggest music geek in Houston and possibly Texas and beyond.

item.title: KNR show 11
item.description: Hey listeners, This is Ryan. IT's my first time to post the show so no fancy schmancy descriptions but I wanted to get it up there for you. ENJOY!
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: Hey listeners, This is Ryan. IT's my first time to post the show so no fancy schmancy descriptions but I wanted to get it up there for you. ENJOY!

item.title: KnR Show #7
item.description: What are we? Professionals? KnR Show #7 is packed full of actual segments. From our Half-Cocked Comment Contest Winners to Ryan's heavily anticipated Sports minute and so much more. Email the show at knrshow -at - knrshow.com.

item.title: KnR Show #4
item.description: The first, and possibly best, 7 or 8 minutes of this show didn't get recorded because Kendall is an idiot. We really need a producer in studio with us.
item.dc:creator: Kendall and Ryan
item.itunes:summary: The first, and possibly best, 7 or 8 minutes of this show didn't get recorded because Kendall is an idiot. We really need a producer in studio with us.
